not_found_description: Sorry, we couldn't find the room or page you're looking for.
home_start_voting_description: Create a new room or join an existing one.
home_create_new_room_description: Configure your voting room settings before creating it.
room_close_room_description: Are you sure you want to leave? Since you are the owner, this will delete the room and remove all participants.
error_kick_self_description: You cannot kick yourself from the room.
error_not_owner_description: Only the room owner can perform this action.
error_user_already_in_room_description: You are already in this room.
error_user_not_in_room_description: The user is not in the room.
error_voting_not_allowed_description: Voting is currently closed for this session.
error_connection_lost_description: Please reload the page or try again.
